name: OMG: TD!
summary: OMG: TD! is an ever-expanding universe of danger and ridiculousness. Unlock and level up the most powerful gods from Greek legend, and imbue them with special powers. Explore 46 thrilling levels set in 5 different worlds. Push your tactical skills to the very limit by playing the game in challenge mode. Battle the terrible Titans and their armies and see who comes out on top!
